remarks: Binary relation expressing the modular pair property.  This version has a weaker constraint than ~ mdbr .  (Contributed by NM, 15-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mdbr2 $p |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) -> ( A MH B <-> A. x e. CH ( x C_ B -> ( ( x vH A ) i^i B ) C_ ( x vH ( A i^i B ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
